description: The operating system (OS) on which the process represented by this resource is running.

os.description.description: Human readable (not intended to be parsed) OS version information, like e.g. reported by `ver` or `lsb_release -a` commands.

os.version.description: The version string of the operating system as defined in [Version Attributes](/docs/resource/README.md#version-attributes).

os.build_id.description: Unique identifier for a particular build or compilation of the operating system.
